idea-plugin.name: Actionable
idea-plugin.description:
Adds some favorite/extra actions that are not available in IntelliJ based IDEs.

Features:
  • Duplicate line(s) up - (VSCode like)
  • Duplicate line(s) down - (VSCode like)
  • Justify carets start
  • Justify carets end
  • Copy word at caret
  • Cut word at caret
  • Move caret to next word
  • Move caret to previous word
  • Move caret to next word with selection
  • Move caret to previous word with selection
For detailed description please visit the github repo
